General.Name: D P Wires Limited
General.Description: D.P. Wires Limited manufactures and supplies steel wires, plastic pipes, and plastic films for oil and gas, power, environment, civil, energy, automobile, infrastructure, and other industries in India and internationally. The company offers LRPC and PC strand wires, HDPE geomembrane sheets, pond lining film, HDPE film, and induction tempered wire. It is also involved in the wind power generation business. The company was founded in 1971 and is based in Ratlam, India.
